name: One Tank to Rule Them All
detailed_description:
What's good about this game?

  • Its trailer. Turn the sound on!
  • Challenging AI.
  • Mechanics - the time goes faster when you move.
  • Graphics - hand-drawn.
  • Physics - the projectiles bounce off the walls (and hit you, muhaahahaa)
  • Memes.
  • You can watch a versus between two bots in the level selection menu.
Grand Total: 42 levels full of (predictably pathetic) attempts to not get hit by a single bullet, while cursing the bots, the physics and, of course, the memes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 1.8GHz (or equivalent AMD)
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 960
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Reduce "Bot Power" in the options to avoid lag if using a slow processor. The game may run on Windows XP, but that's uncertain.

  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.4GHz (or equivalent AMD)
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
